question: 展示过去一周每天的平均温度，周一温度为15°C，周二温度为16°C，周三温度为15.5°C，周四温度为17°C，周五温度为18°C，周六温度为19°C，周日温度为20°C。用面积图可视化
response: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"周一","value":15},{"time":"周二","value":16},{"time":"周三","value":15.5},{"time":"周四","value":17},{"time":"周五","value":18},{"time":"周六","value":19},{"time":"周日","value":20}],"title":"过去一周每天的平均温度变化","axisXTitle":"星期","axisYTitle":"平均温度（°C）"}
answer: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"周一","value":15},{"time":"周二","value":16},{"time":"周三","value":15.5},{"time":"周四","value":17},{"time":"周五","value":18},{"time":"周六","value":19},{"time":"周日","value":20}],"title":"过去一周每日平均温度","axisXTitle":"星期","axisYTitle":"温度 (°C)"}
reference: 面积图 - Area Chart 基础概念

question: 某产品每季度的销售额变化，Q1 销售额为 100,000，Q2 销售额为 110,000，Q3 销售额为 105,000，Q4 销售额为 115,000。用面积图可视化
response: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"Q1","value":100000},{"time":"Q2","value":110000},{"time":"Q3","value":105000},{"time":"Q4","value":115000}],"title":"每季度销售额变化","axisXTitle":"季度","axisYTitle":"销售额"}
answer: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"Q1","value":100000},{"time":"Q2","value":110000},{"time":"Q3","value":105000},{"time":"Q4","value":115000}],"title":"季度销售额变化","axisXTitle":"季度","axisYTitle":"销售额 (元)"}
reference: 面积图 - Area Chart 基础概念

question: 年度降水量变化情况，1月份降水量为78mm，2月份降水量为65mm，3月份降水量为80mm，4月份降水量为120mm，5月份降水量为90mm。用面积图可视化
response: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"1月份","value":78},{"time":"2月份","value":65},{"time":"3月份","value":80},{"time":"4月份","value":120},{"time":"5月份","value":90}],"title":"年度降水量变化","axisXTitle":"月份","axisYTitle":"降水量（mm）"}
answer: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"1月","value":78},{"time":"2月","value":65},{"time":"3月","value":80},{"time":"4月","value":120},{"time":"5月","value":90}],"title":"年度降水量变化","axisXTitle":"月份","axisYTitle":"降水量 (mm)"}
reference: 面积图 - Area Chart 基础概念

question: 展示某网站每天的访客数，星期一有2500访客，星期二有3000访客，星期三有2800访客，星期四有3200访客，星期五有3500访客。用面积图可视化
response: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"星期一","value":2500},{"time":"星期二","value":3000},{"time":"星期三","value":2800},{"time":"星期四","value":3200},{"time":"星期五","value":3500}],"title":"某网站每天访客数变化","axisXTitle":"星期","axisYTitle":"访客数"}
answer: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"星期一","value":2500},{"time":"星期二","value":3000},{"time":"星期三","value":2800},{"time":"星期四","value":3200},{"time":"星期五","value":3500}],"title":"网站日均访客量","axisXTitle":"星期","axisYTitle":"访客数"}
reference: 面积图 - Area Chart 基础概念

question: 比较两个品牌的季度市场份额，品牌A在Q1占20%，Q2占25%，Q3占30%，Q4占35%，品牌B在Q1占80%，Q2占75%，Q3占70%，Q4占65%。用堆叠面积图可视化
response: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"Q1","value":20,"group":"品牌A"},{"time":"Q2","value":25,"group":"品牌A"},{"time":"Q3","value":30,"group":"品牌A"},{"time":"Q4","value":35,"group":"品牌A"},{"time":"Q1","value":80,"group":"品牌B"},{"time":"Q2","value":75,"group":"品牌B"},{"time":"Q3","value":70,"group":"品牌B"},{"time":"Q4","value":65,"group":"品牌B"}],"stack":true,"title":"品牌市场份额变化","axisXTitle":"季度","axisYTitle":"市场份额(%)"}
answer: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"Q1","value":20,"group":"品牌A"},{"time":"Q2","value":25,"group":"品牌A"},{"time":"Q3","value":30,"group":"品牌A"},{"time":"Q4","value":35,"group":"品牌A"},{"time":"Q1","value":80,"group":"品牌B"},{"time":"Q2","value":75,"group":"品牌B"},{"time":"Q3","value":70,"group":"品牌B"},{"time":"Q4","value":65,"group":"品牌B"}],"stack":true,"title":"品牌市场份额季度比较","axisXTitle":"季度","axisYTitle":"市场份额 (%)"}
reference: 面积图 - Area Chart 使用示例

question: 某公司从 2020 年到 2024 年在不同市场的销售数据如下：美国市场分别为 200、220、240、260、280；欧洲市场分别为 150、160、170、180、190。请绘制堆叠面积图展示销售数据。
response: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"2020年","value":200,"group":"美国市场"},{"time":"2021年","value":220,"group":"美国市场"},{"time":"2022年","value":240,"group":"美国市场"},{"time":"2023年","value":260,"group":"美国市场"},{"time":"2024年","value":280,"group":"美国市场"},{"time":"2020年","value":150,"group":"欧洲市场"},{"time":"2021年","value":160,"group":"欧洲市场"},{"time":"2022年","value":170,"group":"欧洲市场"},{"time":"2023年","value":180,"group":"欧洲市场"},{"time":"2024年","value":190,"group":"欧洲市场"}],"stack":true,"title":"2020年到2024年不同市场销售数据","axisXTitle":"年份","axisYTitle":"销售额"}
answer: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"2020年","value":200,"group":"美国"},{"time":"2021年","value":220,"group":"美国"},{"time":"2022年","value":240,"group":"美国"},{"time":"2023年","value":260,"group":"美国"},{"time":"2024年","value":280,"group":"美国"},{"time":"2020年","value":150,"group":"欧洲"},{"time":"2021年","value":160,"group":"欧洲"},{"time":"2022年","value":170,"group":"欧洲"},{"time":"2023年","value":180,"group":"欧洲"},{"time":"2024年","value":190,"group":"欧洲"}],"stack":true,"title":"不同市场销售数据","axisXTitle":"年份","axisYTitle":"销售额"}
reference: 面积图 - Area Chart 使用示例

question: 在过去的三年中，某公司线上和线下销售的收入变化如下：线上收入分别为 1000、1100、1200，线下收入分别为 800、850、900。用堆叠面积图展示这些数据。
response: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"2020年","value":1000,"group":"线上"},{"time":"2021年","value":1100,"group":"线上"},{"time":"2022年","value":1200,"group":"线上"},{"time":"2020年","value":800,"group":"线下"},{"time":"2021年","value":850,"group":"线下"},{"time":"2022年","value":900,"group":"线下"}],"stack":true,"title":"线上与线下销售收入变化","axisXTitle":"年份","axisYTitle":"收入（万元）"}
answer: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":"第一年","value":1000,"group":"线上"},{"time":"第二年","value":1100,"group":"线上"},{"time":"第三年","value":1200,"group":"线上"},{"time":"第一年","value":800,"group":"线下"},{"time":"第二年","value":850,"group":"线下"},{"time":"第三年","value":900,"group":"线下"}],"stack":true,"title":"线上与线下销售收入变化","axisXTitle":"年度","axisYTitle":"收入"}
reference: 面积图 - Area Chart 使用示例

question: 我有一组关于不同产品线年度利润的数据，希望能通过面积图展现出来：产品线A: [{"year": 2015, "profit": 1000}, {"year": 2016, "profit": 1200}], 产品线B: [{"year": 2015, "profit": 800}, {"year": 2016, "profit": 900}]. 同时我希望开启堆叠效果。
response: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":2015,"value":1000,"group":"产品线A"},{"time":2016,"value":1200,"group":"产品线A"},{"time":2015,"value":800,"group":"产品线B"},{"time":2016,"value":900,"group":"产品线B"}],"stack":true,"title":"不同产品线年度利润变化","axisXTitle":"年份","axisYTitle":"利润"}
reference: 面积图 - Area Chart 使用示例

question: 使用堆叠面积图来展示以下两个系列的数据：series A: [{"month": 1, "value": 200}, {"month": 2, "value": 300}], series B: [{"month": 1, "value": 150}, {"month": 2, "value": 250}]. 并给图表加上标题'月度销售趋势'
response: {"type":"area","data":[{"time":1,"value":200,"group":"series A"},{"time":2,"value":300,"group":"series A"},{"time":1,"value":150,"group":"series B"},{"time":2,"value":250,"group":"series B"}],"stack":true,"title":"月度销售趋势","axisXTitle":"月份","axisYTitle":"销售额"}
